original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ caranti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ antoraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam caranti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ carissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ antoraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam carissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ carantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ antoraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam caranti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ carissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ antoraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikāḥ cārikam carissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṁ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī antoraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikā cārikam careyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: tasmiṁ magge corānaṁ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
analyzed: tasmin magge corānam niviṭṭha ukāsaḥ dissati bhutta ukāsaḥ dissati ṭhita ukāsaḥ dissati nisinna ukāsaḥ dissati nipanna ukāsaḥ dissati

original: tasmiṁ magge corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
analyzed: tasmin magge corehi manussāḥ hatāḥ dissanti viluttāḥ dissanti ākoṭitāḥ dissanti

original: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kukkuṭa sampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa
